verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <S%H5329><s%> lam-natz-Tze-acho the chief Musician בִּנְגִינֹ֑ת <S%H5058><s%> [Tbin-gi-Not;on Neginoth מִזְמ֖וֹר <S%H4210><s%> miz-Mor A Psalm לְאָסָ֣ף <S%H623><s%> le-'a-Saf of Asaph שִֽׁיר׃ <S%H7892><s%> Shir. [or] Song נוֹדָ֣ע <S%H3045><s%> no-Da' known בִּֽיהוּדָ֣ה <S%H3063><s%> bi-hu-Dah In Judah אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him; [is] God בְּ֝יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> be-Yis-ra-'El, in Israel גָּד֥וֹל <S%H1419><s%> ga-Dol [is] great שְׁמֽוֹ׃ <S%H8034><s%> she-Mo. his name

וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi is in בְשָׁלֵ֣ם <S%H8004><s%> ve-sha-Lem In Salem סֻכּ֑וֹ <S%H5520><s%> suk-Ko; also is his tabernacle וּמְע֖וֹנָת֣וֹ <S%H4585><s%> u-me-'o-na-To and his dwelling place בְצִיּֽוֹן׃ <S%H6726><s%> ve-tzi-Yon. in Zion

שָׁ֭מָּה <S%H8033><s%> mah There שִׁבַּ֣ר <S%H7665><s%> shib-Bar There brake רִשְׁפֵי־ <S%H7565><s%> rish-fei- he the arrows קָ֑שֶׁת <S%H7198><s%> Ka-shet; of the bow מָגֵ֬ן <S%H4043><s%> ma-Gen the shield וְחֶ֖רֶב <S%H2719><s%> ve-Che-rev and the sword וּמִלְחָמָ֣ה <S%H4421><s%> u-mil-cha-Mah and the battle סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Se-lah. Selah

נָ֭אוֹר <S%H215><s%> Na-'or Thou [art] more glorious אַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah you אַדִּ֗יר <S%H117><s%> 'ad-Dir, [and] excellent מֵֽהַרְרֵי־ <S%H2042><s%> me-har-rei- than the mountains טָֽרֶף׃ <S%H2964><s%> Ta-ref. of prey

אֶשְׁתּוֹלְל֨וּ׀ <S%H7997><s%> 'esh-tol-Lu are spoiled אַבִּ֣ירֵי <S%H47><s%> 'ab-Bi-rei strong לֵ֭ב <S%H3820><s%> lev care for נָמ֣וּ <S%H5123><s%> na-Mu they have slept שְׁנָתָ֑ם <S%H8142><s%> she-na-Tam; their sleep וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- could מָצְא֖וּ <S%H4672><s%> ma-tze-'U have found כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol and none אַנְשֵׁי־ <S%H582><s%> 'an-shei- and none of the men חַ֣יִל <S%H2428><s%> Cha-yil of might יְדֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H3027><s%> ye-dei-Hem. their hands

מִ֭גַּעֲרָ֣תְךָ <S%H1606><s%> mig-ga-'a-Ra-te-cha At thy rebuke אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei O God יַעֲקֹ֑ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko; of Jacob נִ֝רְדָּ֗ם <S%H7290><s%> nir-Dam, are cast into a dead sleep וְרֶ֣כֶב <S%H7393><s%> ve-Re-chev both the chariot וָסֽוּס׃ <S%H5483><s%> va-Sus. and horse

אַתָּ֤ה׀ <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah You נ֥וֹרָא <S%H3372><s%> No-ra Thou [even] thou [art] to be feared אַ֗תָּה <S%H859><s%> 'At-tah, you וּמִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> u-mi- and who יַעֲמֹ֥ד <S%H5975><s%> ya-'a-Mod and who may stand לְפָנֶ֗יךָ <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nei-cha, in thy sight מֵאָ֥ז <S%H227><s%> me-'Az when אַפֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H639><s%> 'ap-Pe-cha. anger

מִ֭שָּׁמַיִם <S%H8064><s%> Mish-sha-ma-yim from heaven הִשְׁמַ֣עְתָּ <S%H8085><s%> hish-Ma'-ta to be heard דִּ֑ין <S%H1779><s%> Din; Thou didst cause judgment אֶ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz the earth יָֽרְאָ֣ה <S%H3372><s%> ya-re-'Ah feared וְשָׁקָֽטָה׃ <S%H8252><s%> ve-sha-Ka-tah. and was still

בְּקוּם־ <S%H6965><s%> be-kum- arose לַמִּשְׁפָּ֥ט <S%H4941><s%> lam-mish-Pat to judgment אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him; When God לְהוֹשִׁ֖יעַ <S%H3467><s%> le-ho-Shi-a' to save כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all עַנְוֵי־ <S%H6035><s%> 'an-vei- all the meek אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz of the earth סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Se-lah. Selah

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- For חֲמַ֣ת <S%H2534><s%> cha-Mat Surely the wrath אָדָ֣ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam of man תּוֹדֶ֑ךָּ <S%H3034><s%> to-De-ka; shall praise שְׁאֵרִ֖ית <S%H7611><s%> she-'e-Rit thee the remainder חֵמֹ֣ת <S%H2534><s%> che-Mot of wrath תַּחְגֹּֽר׃ <S%H2296><s%> tach-Gor. shalt thou restrain

נִֽדֲר֣וּ <S%H5087><s%> ni-da-Ru Vow וְשַׁלְּמוּ֮ <S%H7999><s%> ve-shal-le-Mu and pay לַיהוָ֪ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD אֱ‍ ֽלֹהֵ֫יכֶ֥ם <S%H430><s%> 'elo-Hei-Chem your God כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all סְבִיבָ֑יו <S%H5439><s%> se-vi-Vav; let all that be round about יוֹבִ֥ילוּ <S%H2986><s%> yo-Vi-lu him bring שַׁ֝֗י <S%H7862><s%> shai presents לַמּוֹרָֽא׃ <S%H4172><s%> lam-mo-Ra. unto him that ought to be feared

יִ֭בְצֹר <S%H1219><s%> Yiv-tzor He shall cut off ר֣וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> Ru-ach the spirit נְגִידִ֑ים <S%H5057><s%> ne-gi-Dim; of princes נ֝וֹרָ֗א <S%H3372><s%> no-Ra, [he is] terrible לְמַלְכֵי־ <S%H4428><s%> le-mal-chei- to the kings אָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> 'A-retz. of the earth
